publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1075 John Lamont: Erwin Ureelâ€”That the Parliament recognises the efforts of Erwin Ureel, a native Belgian, who organised not only the erection of a new Scottish Memorial monument at Passchendaele to commemorate the sacrifice made by Scottish servicemen during the First World War but also the unveiling ceremony, almost single-handedly, and considers that his efforts should be recognised by all MSPs.

S3M-1075 Erwin Ureel (lodged on 20 December 2007) Jamie McGrigor*, Margaret Mitchell*, Bill Kidd*, Karen Gillon*, Alex Johnstone*, Jackson Carlaw*, Murdo Fraser*, Bill Aitken*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*
S3M-1075 Erwin Ureel (lodged on 20 December 2007) Mary Scanlon*, Elizabeth Smith*, Rhoda Grant*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, John Scott*
S3M-1075 Erwin Ureel (lodged on 20 December 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-1075 Erwin Ureel (lodged on 20 December 2007) Nanette Milne*, Ted Brocklebank*
S3M-1075 Erwin Ureel (lodged on 20 December 2007) Hugh Henry*
S3M-1075 Erwin Ureel (lodged on 20 December 2007) Aileen Campbell*
